Title: smartTextureMap
Description: Maps the faces in texture map generated from Blender with letters to allow identify them in 3D image and agile the texture process.
HomeWiki:
The life is too short to spend it fixing texture maps

  • Identify if a face was mapped by 3D modeler in upside-down quickyly and react inverting the texture, instead of handle with the model
  • Reduce the travels between 3D modeler and photo editor
  • Concentrate in what is important: avoid to make seams and organize texture map to models less important
  • Be able to create windows batch files to convert how many files as you want it.
